context: Centralized feedback system for enterprise customers. Currently using scattered email/Zendesk. NPS dropped from 45 to 38. Q2 priority with $75K budget.

interviewAnswers.problem: Feedback gets lost across email, Slack, and Zendesk. Product team misses critical customer pain points.
interviewAnswers.targetUser: Customer Success Managers tracking account feedback. Product Managers identifying feature patterns.
interviewAnswers.successMetrics: NPS back to 45+ in 6 months. 80% enterprise adoption in 90 days.
interviewAnswers.mvpScope: Feedback form, status tracking, admin dashboard, email notifications.
interviewAnswers.architecture: Next.js frontend, Node.js API, PostgreSQL. Integrate with Zendesk and Salesforce.
interviewAnswers.security: SSO via Okta, role-based access, audit logging. SOC2 compliance required.

author: Product Team
